scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a tumultuous arrest, likely of Christ, surrounded by a group of soldiers wearing blue helmets and armor. One figure, possibly Christ, is being embraced by another individual in a pink robe, while soldiers grasp and pull at him. Some soldiers are armed with spears. In the background, a decorative tapestry or wall hangs, featuring a geometric pattern of gold diamonds and circles, with two torches burning at the top. The ground is depicted as a simple, textured surface.
